title: Phase 1: Core UI, Overview Dashboard, Countdown, and Chapter Management

requirements.text: Implement dark UI layout with background color #0f0f0f, slightly lighter dark grey for cards and panels, consistent padding and margins (minimum 16px between major sections), and smooth transitions (200-300ms) on all interactive elements. Optimize for Android devices with touch targets minimum 44x44px and mobile-responsive design for screen widths 320px-480px.

quotes: Android-optimized responsive design, 44x44px minimum touch targets

acceptanceCriteria: Background color is #0f0f0f throughout the application
Cards and panels use a slightly lighter dark grey than background
All major sections have minimum 16px spacing between them
All interactive elements have 200-300ms smooth transitions
All touch targets are minimum 44x44px on mobile devices
Layout is fully responsive and functional on screen widths from 320px to 480px

requirements.text: Create a unified Overview dashboard structure that consolidates chapter completion percentage, PCM ratio tracker, War Mode hours counter, and weak chapter alerts in a single screen. Do not include Focus Stability Index, Consistency DNA Tracker, revision module, Top PYQs section, or Performance vs Time graph.

quotes: Do not implement: Revision module, Top PYQs, War Mode, Consistency DNA, Focus Stability Index

acceptanceCriteria: Overview dashboard displays chapter completion percentage
Overview dashboard displays PCM ratio tracker
Overview dashboard displays War Mode hours counter
Overview dashboard displays weak chapter alerts
Focus Stability Index is not displayed on Overview dashboard
Consistency DNA Tracker is not displayed on Overview dashboard
Performance vs Time graph is not displayed anywhere
All metrics are consolidated in a single unified screen layout

requirements.text: Implement real-time countdown timer to JEE Advanced 2026 exam on May 17, 2026, 9:00 AM IST. Display days, hours, minutes, and seconds in large digital font with updates every second. Timer text and styling must automatically turn red when fewer than 30 days remain.

quotes: Real-time countdown: Updates every second to May 17, 2026, 9:00 AM IST, displays days/hours/minutes/seconds, turns red when <30 days remain

acceptanceCriteria: Countdown timer targets May 17, 2026, 9:00 AM IST
Timer displays days, hours, minutes, and seconds
Timer updates every second without page refresh
Timer text is displayed in large digital font
Timer automatically turns red when fewer than 30 days remain
Timer styling and color change work correctly on mobile devices

requirements.text: Split Chemistry subject into three separate sections in the chapter management system: Physical Chemistry, Organic Chemistry, and Inorganic Chemistry. Each section must maintain independent chapter lists with full CRUD capabilities.

quotes: Chemistry split into Physical / Organic / Inorganic

acceptanceCriteria: Chemistry is split into three distinct sections: Physical Chemistry, Organic Chemistry, and Inorganic Chemistry
Each Chemistry section displays its own independent list of chapters
Users can add, edit, and delete chapters within each Chemistry section independently
Backend data model supports storing chapters under Physical, Organic, and Inorganic Chemistry categories
Chapter completion percentage calculations account for all three Chemistry sections separately

requirements.text: Implement full chapter management system with modal-based editing. For each chapter, users must be able to edit chapter name, status (Not Started, In Progress, Completed, Revised Once, Revised Twice, Mastered), weakness level (Weak, Moderate, Strong), accuracy percentage, and last revision date through modal dialogs. Include delete chapter functionality with confirmation modal, and add custom chapter functionality with validation.

quotes: Chapter management system with full modal editing

Full modal-based editing for chapter name, status, weakness level, accuracy %, and revision date. Chemistry split into Physical/Organic/Inorganic. Delete with confirmation, add custom chapters with validation

acceptanceCriteria: Edit chapter functionality opens in a modal dialog
Modal allows editing chapter name with text input
Modal allows editing chapter status with dropdown or select (Not Started, In Progress, Completed, Revised Once, Revised Twice, Mastered)
Modal allows editing weakness level with dropdown or select (Weak, Moderate, Strong)
Modal allows editing accuracy percentage with number input (0-100)
Modal allows editing last revision date with date picker
Delete chapter button opens confirmation modal before deletion
Add custom chapter functionality opens modal with form validation for required fields
All modal interactions work correctly on Android mobile devices with touch input
Backend API supports updating chapter name, status, weakness, accuracy, and revision date
Backend API supports deleting chapters by ID
Backend API supports creating new custom chapters with validation

requirements.text: Implement dynamic chapter completion percentage calculation that updates in real-time as chapter status changes. Calculate completion percentage based on the number of chapters marked as Completed, Revised Once, Revised Twice, or Mastered divided by total number of chapters across all subjects (Physics, Physical Chemistry, Organic Chemistry, Inorganic Chemistry, Mathematics). Display the percentage prominently on the Overview dashboard and update immediately when any chapter status is modified.

quotes: Dynamic Chapter Completion %: Real-time calculation based on chapter status (Not Started, In Progress, Completed, Revised Once, Revised Twice, Mastered)

acceptanceCriteria: Chapter completion percentage is calculated as (completed chapters / total chapters) * 100
Completed chapters include those with status: Completed, Revised Once, Revised Twice, or Mastered
Calculation includes chapters from all subjects: Physics, Physical Chemistry, Organic Chemistry, Inorganic Chemistry, and Mathematics
Percentage displays prominently on Overview dashboard
Percentage updates immediately when any chapter status is changed through edit modal
Percentage updates immediately when new chapters are added or deleted
Backend API returns accurate chapter completion percentage on user data fetch
Frontend recalculates and displays updated percentage without requiring page refresh

constraints: Do not implement Focus Stability Index in this phase
Do not implement Consistency DNA Tracker in this phase
Do not implement Revision module with Theory/PYQs/Advanced tracking in this phase
Do not implement Top PYQs section in this phase
Do not implement War Mode functionality in this phase
Do not implement Performance vs Time graph in this phase
All chapter edits must open in modal dialogs, not inline editing
Backend must use single-actor Motoko architecture with all logic in main actor file

Frontend must not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Implementing revision tracking with Theory/PYQs/Advanced categories
Creating Top PYQs section with year-based tracking
Building War Mode with custom duration and break options
Adding Focus Stability Index calculations and display
Adding Consistency DNA Tracker with daily validation
Implementing Performance vs Time graph with 5 daily blocks
Adding confirmation pop-ups for War Mode entry/exit
Implementing PWA functionality for home screen installation
